settings.question: Natural and Organic Health Care Products for Babies and Mothers
settings.answer_body1: Well Well Well is your one stop shop for organic and natural products for mothers, babies and children. We have a wide selection of natural prenatal supplements and natural baby health care products that have registered Health Canada licensing for quality assurance.

settings.question: What natural products should be considered during pregnancy?
settings.answer_body1: Natural or organic prenatal vitamins or supplements are a great choice during pregnancy, as well as vitamin D, C and fish oil supplements. At Well Well Well we only carry safe and natural health care products for moms and babies. We have available in our store vegan, kosher, organic, and Non GMO prenatal supplements.

settings.question: How do I know if baby products are non toxic?
settings.answer_body1: Always look for preservative, color, perfume free products. When you buy from your trusted retailer, like Well Well Well you can rest assured that all products sold online and in store are natural organic baby products that any mother would feel safe using for their children. We regularly check ingredients lists to ensure that we carry non toxic and safe products.

settings.question: What are the best skincare products for mothers and children?
settings.answer_body1: Natural mother and baby health care and skin care products that do not contain harsh chemicals are things like natural skin oils, plain shea butter and pure baby glycerin soaps. These items contain no extra additives, coloring, perfumes and preservatives.

settings.question: What are the best natural products for babies and children?
settings.answer_body1: The best natural products for babies and children include daily multivitamins, vitamin D drops, probiotics, magnesium and homeopathics remedies. All of these supplements indicate appropriate age and dosing for safety of babies and children. At Well Well Well we have a wide selection of organic children's vitamins available for purchase.

settings.question: What are the best natural health supplements for mothers?
settings.answer_body1: For mothers post pregnancy a prenatal vitamin still can be beneficial. In Canada, our prenatal vitamin selection goes through rigorous NPN designation to ensure the highest quality is available on the market. Also, an intake of essential fatty acids are great for post birth for the mother and the baby if breastfeeding.

settings.question: What are the best organic baby products?
settings.answer_body1: The best organic baby care products minimize the baby’s exposure to herbicides and pesticides. Because children are more susceptible to the effects of toxins from a number of chemicals listed in herbicides and pesticides, it is best to give your baby organic baby care products as they are developing. As a baby is growing and developing, one of the many developing systems is the immune system. There is an increased likelihood and risk for a child to develop illnesses and autoimmune diseases.
